text: T Normae is a Mira variable star. It is located midway between Eta Normae and Gamma Circini. It ranges from magnitude 6.2 to 13.6 and a period of 244 days. Located around 900 light-years distant, it shines with a luminosity 760 times that of the Sun and has a surface temperature of 3234 K. ==References== Category:Mira variables Category:Norma (constellation) Normae, T Category:M-type giants Category:Durchmusterung objects 077058 140041 Category:Emission-line stars
title: T Normae
